ccode.description: Country code for the phone number (without the '+')

pending-ccode.description: New country code that is not yet validated (For pending users)

pending-phone.description: New phone number that is not yet validated (For pending users)

phone-vcode.description: Validation code for new phone number that is not yet validated (For pending users)

pending-email.description: Email that is not yet validated

email-vcode.description: Validation code for new email that is not yet validated

fid.description: User's facebook ID or google ID (For non custom logins)

has-profile.description: Whether the profile pic is set or not

profile.description: id of the profile picture entry id in the flystore/files table (profile ratio: 1:1)

profile-key.description: key of the profile picture entry key in the flystore/files table

has-cover.description: Whether the cover pic is set or not

cover.description: id of the cover picture entry id in the flystore/files table (cover ratio: 16:9 landscape)

cover-key.description: key of the cover picture entry key in the flystore/files table

slug.description: Slugified and customized user's first name + a unique ID

city.description: User's current city (id of the city)

state.description: User's current state (id of the state)

country.description: User's current country (id of the country)
